page.title: 07HOUSING IN CONGLETON
page.content: There are two large and two small Council estates,semi-detached and in some cases detatched houses which are rented to the members of the public who don't own houses of their own.The estates include gardens(front and rear)depending on the age and situation of the houses,shops and recreational facilities e.g. playgrounds,tennis courts and public gardens. Many private homes are also situated on estates,some individual houses cover large areas of land,especially converted farmhouses and homes built by wealthy people (1850-1920)in Hightown,Mossley and West Heath areas...
